item.description:
Hi incubators,

Tomorrow and Sunday are the Boston Skillshare. Basically an awesome teaching fest for locals to teach others what they know. And I will be hosting what i called the Improvised Laughter workshop which will be a mini incubator. So come one all and check out all the other awesome classes going on this weekend.

Check out www.bostonskillshare.org for more info. Hope to see some of you tomorrow and if not have a great holiday and keep yours eyes on your email for more incubator updates possible a memorial day improv jam in my backyard.

Oo oo and I am still a trying to reach my fundraising goal for my marathon run for kids last month so check out www.firstgiving.com/jasonjruns , and if you can give $2.62, a mere 10 cents for every mile I ran. Contact me if you would like to donate via check. All donations are tax deductible.

Any questions about tomorrow give me shout.

Cheers

Jason J.
item.name: Boston Skillshare Incubator tomorrow Saturdy May 29 3:15-4:45pm
